item.title: Rule IDs
item.description: NoteThe content on this page may be outdated. We are currently in the process of rewriting all of our documentation: please bear with us while we update our older content. Why do rule IDs matter? Each rule added to a ModSecurity instance must have a unique ID (in recent versions of modsec). As a result of this it is important that IDs be generated in a preplanned way such that they don't overlap with other rules.

item.title: Metadata
item.description: NoteThe content on this page may be outdated. We are currently in the process of rewriting all of our documentation: please bear with us while we update our older content. OWASP CRS Metadata OWASP CRS 3.x includes several pieces of metadata within rules. Not every rule features all metadata but it is a continuing project where possible to update this information to the best possible level. If you see a rule without a piece of metadata that you think is warranted please open either an issue or a pull request.
